from notebookutils import mssparkutils
from datetime import datetime, date
import pyspark.sql.functions as F

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_appeal_event_estimate_curated_mipins
AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
AppealsEstimateEventID,
ID,
caseReference,
preparationTime,
sittingTime,
reportingTime,
migrated,
ODTSourceSystem,
SourceSystemID,
IngestionDate,
ValidTO,
ROWID,
ISActive

FROM
  odw_harmonised_db.sb_appeal_event_estimate

# prepare dataframe convert UTC to Day light savings for all timestamp fields

# List of UTC timestamp columns to convert
timestamp_columns = [
'IngestionDate',
'ValidTO'
]

# Apply the UTC to London conversion for each column
final_view_df = filtered_df
for column_name in timestamp_columns:
    final_view_df = final_view_df.withColumn(column_name, F.to_timestamp(F.from_utc_timestamp(F.col(column_name), 'Europe/London'), "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS"))
